sig_info: While Heavy Charging, generate 3.06 to 6% Power per second and Heavy Charging can be held for an extended duration.
Landing a Heavy Attack when the opponent Dashes in, Shocks the opponent, dealing 84.66 to 166 Energy damage over 2 seconds.

OVERWHELMING PRESENCE - PASSIVE: Red Skull and the Cosmic Cube emit a presence that opponents cannot overcome. This greatly boosts Red Skulls chances to trigger abilities and provides passive bonuses.
Gain +84.21 Critical Resistance and +84.21 Energy Resistance for each Buff on Red Skull.
The opponent’s Combat Power Rate is reduced by 10% for each Debuff on them
FIGHT START: Gain 5 Armor Up Buffs, each increasing Armor Rating by 177.78. Armor Up Buffs stack up to 10.
BLOCKING A BASIC ATTACK: Consume one Armor Up Buff generated by Red Skull to Power Drain 10% of the opponent’s Max Power and inflict 8.3 as Direct Damage for each Buff on Red Skull.
HEAVY ATTACKS: If the opponent is Stunned, Heal Block them for 7.50 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: The final hit refreshes all Shocks on the opponent inflicted through Red Skull’s abilities and Stuns the opponent for 2 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Each hit Shocks the opponent, dealing 18.68 Energy damage over 2.50 seconds. Shock duration is increased by 50% for each Buff on Red Skull. These Shock Debuffs stack up to 5.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Drain all of the opponent’s Power. For every 10% of Power drained this way, gain an Armor Up Buff.
